name: Gobbo goes adventures
description:
Welcome to a by the climate change burnt world,
a place that can be saved by only one hero: Gobbo

Deal with the evil and ugly Desert Devils in any possible way
and use the environment cleverly, for example with the rusty conveyor belts to solve tricky puzzles in this dirty post industrial but funny adventure.


Controll your character in four isometric directions and drag & drop objects to combine them with others on sky reflecting solar panels!

The game was originally developed in 2011 and is based on the 3D character Gobbo.
Thought to be a spirtual sequel to FunnyPizzaLand Gobbo goes adventures can today be seen as a proper titel and a missing link between FPL and FPL2,
in a future far, far away.

Every 3D rendering, every hand drawn cloud,
- the world of Gobbo goes adventures has been put together by Solo dev and artist Roman.

Key Features:
. surreal comic art style
. five crazy quests full of puzzles
. spirtual sequel to FunnyPizzaLand
. prerendered 3D hero in a hand drawn world
. finally a game to do something about global warming!
. Playtime: a pretty short game but a unique indie game experience
